item.title: AI Safety Diary: September 18, 2025
item.description: A diary entry on Chapter 6 of the AI Safety Atlas, focusing on the challenge of misspecification, where AI systems pursue flawed or incomplete goals, leading to unintended and potentially harmful outcomes.
